title.en: An Aspiration Prayer from the Exceedingly Secret, Enlightened Heart-Essence of the Ḍākinī

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Dharmakāya Vajradhara, Saṃbhogakāya Vajrasattva,
text.en-trans: chöku dor chang longku dorjé sem

text.en: Nirmāṇakāya Stainless Sage Loktripāla,1
text.en-trans: tulku drangsong drimé sangwé dak

text.en: Garab Dorjé, Śrī Siṃha, Padmākara, Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: garab shri seng pejung bi ma la

text.en: The embodiment of all— root Guru Tötrengtsel
text.en-trans: kündü tsawé lama tötreng tsal

text.en: The deities of the three roots and the assemblies of sages andvidyādharas,
text.en-trans: tsa sum lha dang drangsong rigdzin tsok

text.en: Remain here as witness to the accomplishment of my truthful words.
text.en-trans: dak gi dentsik drubpé pangpor zhuk

text.en: Since the dawn of delusion until this moment in time,
text.en-trans: tokmar trulpa né zung danté bar

text.en: We have taken countless births in this [conditioned] existence.
text.en-trans: si dir dak lü drangmé lang gyur kyang

text.en: Yet, as we have not seized the mind of emptiness-bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: tongnyi changchub sem kyi mazinpé

text.en: We are fettered by the tight shackles of attachment and aversion and
text.en-trans: dadung chakdang chingwa dampö ching

text.en: Are still enveloped by the darkness of non-recognition.
text.en-trans: dak ni marik tibpö drib lak kyang

text.en: But by the timely ripening of the guru’s kind aspirations,
text.en-trans: lamé tukkyé dü su minpa yi

text.en: We have met the exceedingly secret indestructible path.
text.en-trans: dakchak yangsang dorjé lam dang tré

text.en: May we be freed from the restraints of attachment and aversion this very instant.
text.en-trans: dani chakdang drok lé drolwar shok

text.en: Connected by the karma of innumerable lives,
text.en-trans: drangmé kyewar lé kyi drelpa yi

text.en: Companions who enjoy great bliss on the path of skillful means,
text.en-trans: tab lam nampar rolpé dechen drok

text.en: Mothers and fathers who nurture us with love and kindness,
text.en-trans: jam dang tsewé kyangwé pama dang

text.en: Vajra siblings who are connected by sharing tantric commitments,
text.en-trans: damtsik chik tu drelwé dorjé ché

text.en: Essentially, all sentient beings pervading space—
text.en-trans: tso gyur khakhyab semchen tamché kün

text.en: May we invigorate ourselves through the four [thoughts] that turn the mind [toward practice],
text.en-trans: lo dok nampa zhi yi gyü kul né

text.en: Develop diligence that is single-pointedly focused on the excellent teachings,
text.en-trans: tsechik dampé chö la tsöndrü kyé

text.en: And perfect the qualities of the three trainings!
text.en-trans: labpa sum gyi yönten tarchin shok

text.en: May the ripening blessings and four empowerments of
text.en-trans: maha anu atiyoga yi

text.en: Mahā, Anu, and Ati yoga mature our mind-streams.
text.en-trans: min jé jinlab wang zhi ranggyü min

text.en: May we perfect the supreme paths of the creation and perfection stages,
text.en-trans: kyé dang dzokpé lam chok tarchin né

text.en: And uphold the vajra commitments without any degeneration.
text.en-trans: mi nyam dorjé dam la nepar shok

text.en: May we perfect the maṇḍala of the victors within our own bodies of great bliss—
text.en-trans: dechen rang lü gyalwé kyilkhor dzok

text.en: Train the channels, control the energy, and make the essences pliable,
text.en-trans: tsa jong lung chün tiklé lé rung zhing

text.en: Inseparably merging energy and mind through
text.en-trans: ga zhi yeshe terwé dza namor

text.en: Uniting with the consort who bestows the primordial wisdom of the four joys.
text.en-trans: jorwé lungsem yermé drepar shok

text.en: May we seize the royal seat of the dharmakāya, the unshifting view,
text.en-trans: tawa pomé chökü gyalsa zin

text.en: Meditate without hope, fear, distraction, and delusion, and
text.en-trans: gompa yengmé trul drol redok dral

text.en: Conduct ourselves free of rejection and acceptance—
text.en-trans: chöpa panglang dralwa chönyi tsal

text.en: Resulting in the power of suchness completelycutting throughto the ground.
text.en-trans: trekchö drebu zhi la dzokpar shok

text.en: May we perfect the fundamental points concerning luminosity on the path of Ati,
text.en-trans: ati lam gyi tsawa ösal né

text.en: [The meditational stages of] fluctuation, attainment, habituation, stability, and completion
text.en-trans: tögal drönma zhi yi lam chok la

text.en: Upon the supreme path of the four lamps ofleaping-over;
text.en-trans: yo tob gom ten tarchin tsal dzok né

text.en: May we awaken to the great exhaustion of phenomena devoid of conceptualization.
text.en-trans: lodral chö zé chenpor sangye shok

text.en: May all connected sentient beings who have not embarked on the path
text.en-trans: lam la ma zhuk drelpé semchen kün

text.en: Awaken on the greatly glorious and blissful Mount Potala
text.en-trans: dak gi dü sum sakpé gé tsok dang

text.en: Through the power of this caring and fervent aspiration prayer
text.en-trans: jedzin mönlam drakpö tu nü kyi

text.en: And my accumulated virtuous actions of the three times.
text.en-trans: dechen pota palrir sangye shok

text.en: May the vajra masters and vajra companions in all my lifetimes
text.en-trans: daknyi kyé kün dorjé lobpön dang

text.en: Who are connected by the four joys of the profound path
text.en-trans: zablam ga zhi drelpé dorjé drok

text.en: And the siblings and knowledge holders who share tantric commitments
text.en-trans: damtsik chikpé checham rigdzin tsok

text.en: Never part but be established in the same maṇḍala.
text.en-trans: mindral kyilkhor chik tu khöpar shok

text.en: May the innumerable billions of emanations
text.en-trans: natsok tab kyi semchen dönjé ching

text.en: Who benefit sentient beings through various means
text.en-trans: trulpa jewa trak gya drangmé kyi

text.en: Skillfully teach the doctrine in their respective languages,
text.en-trans: rang rang ké du tabkhé chö tön ching

text.en: Dredging the depths of the ocean of cyclic existence.
text.en-trans: khorwé gyatso dong né trukpar shok

text.en: May the children of the father and mother— method and wisdom
text.en-trans: tartuk yabyum tabshé checham sé

text.en: Ultimately perfect the practice of the great saṃbhogakāya.
text.en-trans: longku chenpö nyamlen tarchin né

text.en: May they be liberated as a single maṇḍala
text.en-trans: chöying womin zhönnu bumkü long

text.en: In the Akaniṣṭha space of phenomena, the expanse of the youthful vase body.
text.en-trans: tsombu chik tu yermé drolwar shok

text.en: May this aspirational prayer of truthful words be accomplished without obstruction,
text.en-trans: chönyi rangzhin nampar dakpa dang

text.en: And the exceedingly secret teachings never wane but flourish far and wide
text.en-trans: chöchen gyundré luwa mepé tü

text.en: Due to naturally pristine suchness and
text.en-trans: dentsik mönlam gekmé drub gyur né

text.en: The infallible power of the causes and results of [conditioned] phenomena.
text.en-trans: yangsang tenpa mi nub tar gyé shok

text.en: May this teaching like the maṇḍala of the sun and moon
text.en-trans: chö tsul di yang nyidé kyilkhor zhin

text.en: Be renowned throughout every region,
text.en-trans: chok kyi tadru küntu drak gyur ching

text.en: Cause the light of intelligence to fully expand, and
text.en-trans: lodrö nangwa rabtu gyé jé né

text.en: The teachings of the buddhas to flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: sangye tenpa dar zhing gyepar shok

text.en: May the teachings of the three vajras flourish and spread:
text.en-trans: ngowo gyurmé rangjung dorjé ku

text.en: The vajra body of the natural, unchanging essence,
text.en-trans: rang dang gakmé changchub dorjé sung

text.en: The vajra speech of the unimpeded, natural enlightened expressions,
text.en-trans: trödral uma jalü dorjé tuk

text.en: The vajra mind of the rainbow body, the middle way devoid of elaborations.
text.en-trans: dorjé sum gyi tenpa dargyé shok
